query: Could you create a 3-day travel plan for two people departing from Salt Lake City and heading to Helena from March 25th to 27th, 2022, which aligns with our new budget of $2,100? Please ensure our accommodations allow children under 10 years old and are amenable to changes in the number of rooms required. We will not be using our own car, so transportation arrangements must be included. We have diverse tastes when it comes to food - we enjoy Mediterranean, American, Chinese, and Indian cuisines.
